name: Repairminator
description:
2.5D action-arcade 2 player versus game where each player uses pieces falling from the sky to repair their robot, or slow the other player down.

This game has been developed for the Global Game Jam 2020: "repair".

https://globalgamejam.org/2020/games/repairobo-6

Credits: 

  • DOUSSIN Alice : Game Designer
  • BARREYRE Baptiste : Game Designer
  • BENARD Hugo : 3D Game Artist
  • RAYER Mattéo : Game Programmer
  • FRELING Fabien : Game Programmer
  • BIEWER Renaud : Sound and Music designer
  • BOULONNE Laurie-Anne : 2D Game Artist
  • GARNIER Corto : Assistant Game Designer
